oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Writing exercises in Arabic letters, repeating the combinations of the letters Jim, Ha, Kha with other letters. The first two lines are written in grey ink (? it looks like a pencil) in another hand, probably the hand of the teacher: the first line contains combinations of Jim, Ha, Kha with other letters in Hebrew letters, the second line contains the parallel combinations in Arabic letters, which are then imitated in a less confident hand by the student in the following lines.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Writing exercises
